Html: Is there a posible to create a custom Gauss-Krueger based on false easting, false northing, central meridian and scale factor?

This Gauss-Krueger class is designed for german coordinates only (Potsdam Datum). We are planning to incorporate the austrian coordinate system (Datum Austria). Are you planning to use it for the german coordinate system only? If so, we may entend the class with this functionality.

Hi, actually I'm from Costa Rica(America), and as far as I know it's also used on many South America's countries. In my case I use as a reference WGS84 Datum and a based on Gauss-Krueger projection called CRTM05. CRTM05 is the Costa Rica standard. It uses a false easting of 500.000 meters, false northing of 0 meters, reference meridian is 84 W, reference paralel is 0 degrees and the scale factor is 0.9999. I'll hope you could help with this. Thanks.

Hi,

sorry for resurrecting this thread, but I just read:
"We are planning to incorporate the austrian coordinate system (Datum Austria)."

That would be great :-)

Best regards,
Helmut

Did you make it? Or are you still planning to add it?

Regards!
